name: Ginsei Table Games Wii
summary: In "Ginsei Table Games Wii", there are many small table games. This game includes Go, Shogi, Chess, Backgammon, Mahjong and other chess games. In the World Congress mode, players will compete against the computer for first place in the World Congress. The difficulty of the game can be adjusted freely, so that beginners to advanced players can enjoy the game! The game will also increase game points, titles, etc. according to the record. There are 100 titles in this game. You can also get medals after fulfilling the corresponding conditions!
